pkgmetadata.longdescription: # IllumiGator2D Light-Based Puzzle Game## Source Code and Other Resourceshttps://github.com/EltonLi2000/IllumiGatorhttps://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1HQ1lIxgZJNANgWnts3bsWUUTnnfJrKXW?usp=sharing(contains timesheet and project ideas)## Dependenciesarcadenumpyscreeninfo## Installpip install illumigatorrun **illumigator** command
